properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac 5NM Off Shore to US/Canadian border; Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI; Lake Huron from Port Sanilac to Port Huron 5NM Off Shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 4:12PM EST until January 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 27 knots from the north
with gusts up to 40 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 11 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 16 feet.

* WHERE...Southern Lake Huron.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 8 PM EST Saturday
with the largest waves expected around 8 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wintry mix of precipitation or just
freezing rain will also develop on Saturday and continue into
Saturday night.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY
